alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 9:47PM PST until December 16 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Upper San Joaquin River, Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge and Kings Canyon NP Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
